page.title: 19CLUBS-FARNINGHAM
page.content: Farningham has a wide range of leisure activities for its community. The village hall is a lively place. A mother and baby club meet for a chat and a cup of coffee. The leisure club is for the older members of the community-they have talks, outings to the theartre, country-side and sales of work. The Horticultural Society helps keen gardeners and has annual shows, it also decorates the church. Anyone interested in Amateur Dramatics belongs to the active Axstane Players. Farningham Womens Institute (W.I) promotes a wide range of interests. Newly formed Historical Society for people interested in preserving records of our village life. There are Cricket and football clubs. Darts, snooker, and pool are played in our village working Mens Club. A folk club and Morris dancers also meet in the village pub.
